author: spencer_tb
content:
ðŸ§ª Fusaka Devnet-3 EEST release v1.0.0: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/releases/tag/fusaka-devnet-3@v1.0.0

- Updates the gas prices for EIP-7883, EIP-7939 and EIP-7951.
- Changes the blob base fee cost for EIP-7918. 
- Reduces the transaction gas limit for EIP-7825.
- Adds tests for the new `maxBlobsPerTx` limit.
- Includes additional tests for EIP-7934 & EIP-7939.
- Removes tests for EIP-7907. 

Ping for any issues!
